derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: probably of Dutch or Low German origin

entry.def: A hunk of something is a large piece of it.

entry.tran: 高大健壮的男子;魁梧性感的男子;猛男
entry.def: If you refer to a man as a hunk, you mean that he is big, strong, and sexually attractive.

example.tran: 金发碧眼、魁梧性感的男子

means.word_mean: 2. a large piece of something without definite shape;
